trans-unit.target: Ferramentas de lista instaladas de forma global ou local.

trans-unit.source: Use `dotnet workload search` to find additional workloads to install.
trans-unit.target: Use `dotnet workload search` to find additional workloads to install.

trans-unit.source: This command lists only workloads that were installed via `dotnet workload install` in this version of the SDK and not those that were installed via Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: This command lists only workloads that were installed via `dotnet workload install` in this version of the SDK and not those that were installed via Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Updates are avaliable for the following workload(s): {0}. Run `dotnet workload update` to get the latest.
trans-unit.target: Updates are avaliable for the following workload(s): {0}. Run `dotnet workload update` to get the latest.
